website_summaries.verdict: A great choice for anyone who wants pure argan oil with no additional ingredients, but the scent and oily feel isn't for everyone.
pros: Contains only pure, organic Moroccan cold-pressed argan oil that's not tested on animals
Can be used on hair, skin, and nails
A few drops at a time are all you need – it goes a long way
cons: Feels oily on the skin and hair

customer_reviews.title: Soft and shiny
customer_reviews.text: I love this product it is my second time purchasing it. I rub a few drops in my hands and rub it in my dry hair. It leaves my hair soft and shiny . My hair is colored and loses bounce and shine this helps!
customer_reviews.author: Annie

customer_reviews.title: Good quality but packaging flaws
customer_reviews.text: I have relaxed (chemically straightened) hair that is damaged from heat. I like that this helps to moisturize my ends and smooth it out the frizziness from humidity. This is pretty expensive for its size so I doubt I will repurchase. I don't like the packaging. The photo is misleading and shows a dropper for the 4 oz size. Unless mine was damaged or missing this, it did not come with it. The bottle doesn't have a stopper so the oil is really easy to waste if you pour too much.
customer_reviews.author: MusicfanTop Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: Works well, lasts a long time.
customer_reviews.text: I just use a few drops after I wash my hair, and it definitely helps my hair feel softer and not as dry. No noticable scent when used.
customer_reviews.author: David Bohn

customer_reviews.title: Not so great!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because I was out of my morrocan oil. It had great reviews so thought I would give it a try. It’s probably ok for skin but it has no slip and doesn’t spread through hair easily and makes it greasy. I mentioned to company after they contacted me several times to make sure I gave a good review. Then I never heard from them.
customer_reviews.author: jb

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff
customer_reviews.text: I bought one bottle first to try it, its really good, I even stopped buying my Clarin's cream for this, my skin is softer and even some dark spots on my face are vanishing. I recommend it
customer_reviews.author: Ivannia

customer_reviews.title: Smells terrible!
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to like this product, but I just couldn't. It smells rancid...like a pasture full of manure, and all it did was make my sensitive skin breakout in tiny bumps/acne on my face.
customer_reviews.author: Alirob4

customer_reviews.title: Magical Oil!
customer_reviews.text: Can't say enough about this product, ordered the small bottle before and loved it so much got the big one this time. Use this in the morning and evening on my face and it's so soft...highly recommend this product and company. It's not greasy and no odor for us that have allergies with scents. Packaging is great and arrives when they say it will.
customer_reviews.author: crystallover

customer_reviews.title: Arrived on time and beautifully intact. 🌺
customer_reviews.text: So far everything is wonderful, but i will be updating my review in like one month to see if i see result or not.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Rivera

customer_reviews.title: Great, affordable skin care!
customer_reviews.text: This is great oil! I use this in place of my usual serums and expensive creams. I am 47 and have spent a lot of my life in the sun, so I'm working with normal, aged skin . After using for several weeks, I am noticing the softening of my forehead, eye and mouth wrinkles and my decollate creasing is almost gone! I was worried that it would break me out, but went ahead tried it on the advice of a friend. Although it is oil, it absorbs in the skin well. I will be purchasing again!
customer_reviews.author: Clarice

customer_reviews.title: Even a 63 year old man
customer_reviews.text: I started using Moroccan argon oil in my hair a year ago. I since switched to Eve Hansen because of the purity of the oil. I have long hair past my shoulders. Eve Hansen Argan oil keeps my hair from drying out due to Monthly use of Naturtint permanent hair color. It gives my hair a silky shine with only a few drops worked in. I will be reordering when my bottle is close to empty. Thanks for a great product Eve Hansen and thanks for your product giving me some youth back.
customer_reviews.author: Gary

customer_reviews.title: I was looking for Vitamin E because I used it ...
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for Vitamin E because I used it in the past for cut's,blemishes and other uses, and I saw this Argan Oil, it has vitamin E in it and I have 3 teenage granddaughter and tough they could use it on scars from blemishes, to day was my first day using it so I will come back in a week or two to tell you who it worked, I know Vitamin does, my husband cut 4 fingers with the lawnmower, and a neighbor poured Vitamin E on it and then he had stitches put in to close the cuts,after he healed no scars from the cuts..
customer_reviews.author: SilverLady70

customer_reviews.title: Huge Helper for Dry Skin
customer_reviews.text: I was having a major issue with getting my skin to stay moisturized during the dry fall & winter weather. Using this argan oil has been a HUGE help! I added this to my nighttime skincare routine, & now my face stays hydrated! I use it with the Eve Hansen hyaluronic acid serum, & would definitely recommend both products to anyone having issues with dry skin. Will absolutely be ordering again. Bonus: Argan oil can have multiple uses, so I also use it on my cuticles when doing my nails & my fiance occasionally uses it as a beard oil.
customer_reviews.author: Karen B.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent. My dry skin loves this Eve Hansen Organic Argan Oil, especially during the Fall/Winter months. I just use it before bed at night, wash my face in the morning and spray with the Eve Hansen Rosewater Spray before I use my Jane Iredale Amazing Base Powder Foundation. Let the rosewater spray dry for a few minutes before applying powder foundation with a soft brush. Looks so natural and so easy! I love fast and easy!
customer_reviews.author: Margaret

customer_reviews.title: Oil was rotten
customer_reviews.text: This oil had a funky smell to it. I would describe it as a manure smell.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: what a rip off
customer_reviews.text: disgusting!!!I have ordered this item before and liked it. This last order was a different size bottle (smaller) and the stuff in the bottle was this thick nasty crap. Yah Yah what a rip off. I don't believe that this a legitimate product. Boy this makes me mad. This the reason why we have to go into a store to look at the product.
customer_reviews.author: amp

customer_reviews.title: DISGUSTING!
customer_reviews.text: I immediately returned as soon as i opened the bottle. It smelled like extremely old used vegetable oil. I knew it was too good to be true.... THIS IS NOT TRUE ARGON OIL! Back to Josie Maran I go....
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: High Quality Argan Oil
customer_reviews.text: This is high quality argan oil. I use it on my face. It's light and absorbs easily, helps dryness, and doesn't break me out like rose hip seed oil does. It's the best facial oil I've tried so far, even better than jojoba oil. I just use a few drops and rub it in twice a day. I will definitely purchase this again.
customer_reviews.author: Sunshine

customer_reviews.title: Peculiar smell
customer_reviews.text: This argon oil had a smell I found unpleasant and did not want on my face. I was told Argan oil has no fragrance. I recently purchased another brand, less expensive here on Amazon and it has no fragrance.
customer_reviews.author: doreen

customer_reviews.title: I like this stuff
customer_reviews.text: I bought it to use on my hair as it is getting more and more fly away as I get older. It has settled the hair down very much, No more bed head. The oil has a very mild smell; not at all offensive. I use three drops for my head, as per the directions, and two drops for my van dyke beard.
customer_reviews.author: Bob Prentiss

customer_reviews.title: Didn't noticed a difference
customer_reviews.text: Never noticed any difference. I didn't really gave it a full try. I added this oil to the skin around my eyes and around the mouth for small fine wrinkles. I heard that this helps with that. I used it nightly for about 3 weeks and didn't noticed the slightest difference at all. I'm in my mid 20s so I'm just trying to prevent any future damage and I read that oil around the eyes at night can actually be bad and create bags under the eyes. Since I didn't noticed any kind of improvement on my small fine lines, I decided not to add bags under my eyes, by insisting. Don't know of any other uses for this product.
customer_reviews.author: Victor Villa

customer_reviews.title: sooo good! I initially purchased this product for my hair ...
customer_reviews.text: So far, sooo good! I initially purchased this product for my hair after searching for Moroccan Oil and noticing that Argan Oil had superior reviews for hair. I've since been using it on my face and hair and I've been very pleased with its effects. It adds moisture and smoothness to my skin without leaving oil or grease and also reduces the flyaway in my hair (also without adding oil or grease). Argan Oil is part of my new miracle cocktail. My skin and hair haven't felt this great in ages! Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Good oil as a moisturizer for dry skin/face and hair
customer_reviews.text: I love this Argan oil...I have been using this oil for about 3 years now and I absolutely like how it makes my skin and hair feel. There are multiple uses to it, but I use it as a moisturizer for my face,as I have normal to dry skin, with or without makeup and a few drops for my hair after hair wash to lock the moisture and settle my naturally wavy hair. If you are looking for an oil moisturizer I would recommend it. Try not to use too much but a few drops depending on your skin. Also, I use virgin coconut oil as a moisturizer, that's something you could use too.
customer_reviews.author: SRB

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product. Good value
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. Good value. I especially liked that the owner of the company sent a follow up email to ensure we received the product and also gave more information on other beneficial uses for the product. I am using this product in a face cream I am making. It smells great and feels really nourishing on your skin thanks to this oil.
customer_reviews.author: Nadine Butler

customer_reviews.title: Returning or throwing in the trash
customer_reviews.text: It smelled horrible. The previous argon oil I've used did not smell at all. This one smelled smelled rancid. The oil was thicker than the previous argon oil I used as well. This argon oil broke my skin out. I will never buy this brand again. Terrible quality control. Also, the dropper is crap. The oil falls out of so quickly without squeezing the top which makes it pretty messy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: An effective replacement for a more expensive oil!
customer_reviews.text: Been shopping around in hopes of finding a quality Argan oil that is less expensive than the one I have used for years from Josie Maran since she decided to charge the same but for less product ! This oil has not disappointed; appears to give me the same results so I’m happy. Seller shipped on time and in good condition!
customer_reviews.author: Jeane R.

customer_reviews.title: Rancid on arrival; issued return for a replacement. Will update review if replacement is better.
customer_reviews.text: Just arrived in the mail. The item I received smells similar to horse manure, so I'm assuming it's rancid; some of the other complaints seen here match the same description. I figure this is going to happen in some cases. I've issued a return for a replacement; will update this review if the replacement product I receive is in better condition.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Use it everywhere.
customer_reviews.text: This product is amazing. I've been using it for 4 days mixed in with my body lotion, in my bath and even by itself and it's great. I used it everywhere....my feet, my hands, my face and it has done wonders. I will be back and probably to get a larger bottle. The true test will be in Sept when I start radiation but from what I see, this should help tremendously and it's natural and organic. A++++
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love it!
customer_reviews.text: This is my second time purchasing the 1oz bottle. I use a few drops on my face and hair daily and my first bottle lasted close to a year. I have dry skin year round and this really moisturizes well and doesn't cause break outs. In fact, my acne disappeared shortly after I made this argan oil my daily moisturizer. My skin looks and feels great and some scars have begun to fade. I never thought oil on my face would be the solution to my moderate acne, but it really has made my face completely clear and I will continue to use it!
customer_reviews.author: C. Thrash

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely LOVE this oil
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely LOVE this oil. It makes my skin feel so good, smooth and hydrated. I am a big fan of using coconut, jojoba oils also and argan is probably my number 1 at this point. **UPDATE: I rarely write reviews and I never provide updates but I felt I really should in this case. After using this product for almost 3 weeks I am absolutely and totally in LOVE with it! No need to buy expensive facial creams and any other products anymore. This oil is true "GOLD"! I have been using Argon Oil every night and my face looks very radiant, fresh and smooth in the morning. I am hooked :-)
customer_reviews.author: T & R

customer_reviews.title: Great stuff
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic stuff. I bought this for two very dark scars on my forearm that looked like cigarette burns (mechanic accident...don't ask). Actually, I bought this thinking it was just Vitamin E oil, not knowing anything about Argan Oil at the time. I've used a few drops on each scar once a day for about 3 months and the scars are almost gone. Completely. I've also started using it on my face and (shaved) head with great results. I've since done research on Argan oil and needless to say I'm impressed. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Happy with purchase
customer_reviews.text: I like this just as well (maybe more) than the Josie Maran that I've used in the past. The color is a light golden, and the batch that i received had a nutty scent, it was actually more of a coffee- like scent, very pleasant. Will most likely continue to purchase in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Carmina Burana

customer_reviews.title: This is good stuff! I was a little nervous at first ...
customer_reviews.text: This is good stuff! I was a little nervous at first since it seems to be such a low price for a larger quantity, but I am pleasantly surprised. This oil is not greasy at all and it is so smooth and sinks right into the skin. It does have a subtle nutty smell that I am not crazy about, but so does every other argan oil I have ever used. The smell subsides very quickly so it's not a bother at all. I plan on making a serum with this and some other essential oils anyway, so I think it will work out just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Angel Marie

customer_reviews.title: Expired?
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this product for more than 3 years with good result. But the latest bottle came in cloudy (they're normally crystal clear, I've attached a photo to compare with my old one). I try to find the exp. date on the bottle with no luck, try to contact seller but no answer. Not sure if this is safe to use.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Great product!! I have used this on my face as a moisturizer. Works very well form my combination, acne-prone skin. I allso lighten my hair every 4-6 weeks, so you can imagine that it is prone to be dry and can damage easily. I have used the argan oil on the ends sparingly ( don't need to use a lot as a little goes along way ) . I massage the oil on the ends especially in areas that are prone to breakage. It has improved the porous texture of my hair and makes my hair manageable.
customer_reviews.author: Tigerkitty

customer_reviews.title: WONDERFUL!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great addition to any beauty or skin/hair care regimen. As other reviewers have said it almost instantaneously softens and smooths facial skin. It is amazing how quickly it is absorbed. I also add it too my favorite lotions and it really makes a difference. I haven't tried it on my hair, yet, but I'm sure it will add shine. I am not a fan of the scent but it is not noticeable once it is absorbed. This is a great oil and I love having such a large bottle...I feel like I can really splurge and give all my skin a treat.
customer_reviews.author: DoTharp

customer_reviews.title: I want to bathe in this!
customer_reviews.text: After just one week of using this Argan oil, I can say this is the best treatment I have tried. At first I used it on my hands and neck at night. My hands are now smooth and younger looking and the horizontal lines on my neck are gone. I've started to use it on my elbows, knees, and feet and I have to say, what it does to my feet is a miracle! I should also point out, it does absorb easily without an oily mess. I'm buying another bottle for my office to replace my hand-cream. I feel like I am late to the party but still happy to be here.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Marie Menendez

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product on my face as a base before I use serum, then day moisturizer for about a year now. I have extremely dry and thin skin and this really helps ease the signs of aging. It is a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Nana99

customer_reviews.title: Light moisture
customer_reviews.text: Light enough for under makeup in the desert 🌵 I use before bed over my regular moisturizer but I live on the desert climate with naturally non greasy skin.
customer_reviews.author: Mindy

customer_reviews.title: Good value.
customer_reviews.text: Works really well, just need a few drops. Doesn't make my hair look greasy and its keeping my ends healthy. Very comparable to my josie maran but I like the texture of that one a little more. Also be careful when you open it because they FILL it to the top with product, Bonus in my book!!
customer_reviews.author: Marlena

customer_reviews.title: my face would be super dry again
customer_reviews.text: I have chronic dry skin, no beauty cream ever worked for me.. as soon as I stepped out, my face would be super dry again.. This oil has improved my condition soooo much, my skin absorbs it very easily without leaving it feeling greasy or heavy, I apply twice a day.. its been 2 weeks and my face feels amazing, it even looks lighter, great product!
customer_reviews.author: Diana

customer_reviews.title: Prompt delivery. Product was well packaged. I have ...
customer_reviews.text: Prompt delivery. Product was well packaged. I have used it both alone and as an ingredient in my creams - either way, it leaves my skin extremely soft. I am looking forward to trying some other oils from this company and will definitely be repurchasing this Argan oil from them. Update November 29, 2016 It's been almost a year and I've just got done with this oil. Amazing! Gearing up to order my 2nd bottle from this manufacturer. It leaves my oily skin supple and moist.
customer_reviews.author: Funke

customer_reviews.title: Love this oil!
customer_reviews.text: Having two special needs children I've adopted, and being fifty eight with little sleep, this oil has helped my skin immensely! And the company truly cares about their customers and goes beyond to make sure you are happy and satisfied. In this day and age that is priceless. No sense paying more when the highest quality argan oil is available at this very reasonable price! I actually looked to see the other oils sold by this company as I will make it a point to purchase from them again!
customer_reviews.author: marji

customer_reviews.title: Good oil for many uses!
customer_reviews.text: I like the oil but I really have to use often on my hands because of excessive dryness. The winter weather is the worse for my dry skin. I have been using it for my hands, hair and mixed in with Shea Butter to add more oil and to help in moisturizing my skin. It is nice to mix some with some olive ,the (extra virgin olive oil kind, as an moisturizer on the hair after washing and conditioning. It is less tangle and feels soft!
customer_reviews.author: Charzee

customer_reviews.title: Good moisturizer, but nothing special!
customer_reviews.text: It's okay. Been using it for almost 3 weeks. It's a great moisturizer to lock in moisture after washing your face, but I've noticed no significant changes in my skin itself. It goes on light and smells somewhat like rubber bands the first few minutes of application.
customer_reviews.author: CaliMermaid

customer_reviews.title: Super greasy
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used other oils on my hair and skin because I have really dry hair and nothing ever made me feel as greasy and oily as this product did. I barley used any and my hair would clump it’s disgusting.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This product is great because I haven't noticed a scent and it has ...
customer_reviews.text: Argan oil is one of the only things I can find to help the periodic eczema that I get on my face and on other areas. This product is great because I haven't noticed a scent and it has calmed and really moisturized my skin. Love that this product is organic and so versatile, and I typically mix with my lotion when I'm applying it after a shower. Also, this bottle is a great value. My one comment would be that I wish the dropper wouldn't release the oil without squeezing, since sometimes that can be a little messy. Other than that, the product and my experience have been great!
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Bottle would not open properly
customer_reviews.text: Weird packaging ... couldn’t open, dropper seemed way too big for bottle. Broke bottle trying to open, had to throw out
customer_reviews.author: NY Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: Great product ......my daughter didn't believe oil treatments would make her hair look fantastic until she tried this! If that doesn't say it all then i don't know what does !
customer_reviews.author: Kareese

customer_reviews.title: Argon Oil is Good
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with this product and the Eve Hansen co. The company is very interested in how I received my package. The product is not heavy and blends into my skin beautifully. I am of a mature age and anything that gives my skin a more youthful feel and look is very important to me. Plus anyone Other than an infant will appreciate this great feeling skin.
customer_reviews.author: Georgia A. Wilder

customer_reviews.title: I'm so happy with this oil
customer_reviews.text: I live in Utah and it's very dry here. This oil has made my skin so much softer and my hair is shiny and much less dry! I'm going to keep doing oil treatments once a week in my hair and I just ordered a heating cap to make it even more effective. I have very long, thick, untreated hair. I'm so happy with this oil!
customer_reviews.author: Keely

customer_reviews.title: High Quality, Great Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: There are a lot of oils on the market; this one is clean and 'smooth', a good quality product and I love the simple packaging - letters that I can read after a shower with no glasses on - Its a great quality product, and the company has amazing follow up. A healing oil, Argan needs to be well made to be effective; this one does the trick. I received a lovely message from the company which prompted my review for Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight oil
customer_reviews.text: I love the oil it's very lightweight and it doesn't have a bad sent it absorbs nicely and doesn't leave my face feeling greasy
customer_reviews.author: bkemah

customer_reviews.title: A great product...
customer_reviews.text: I have been using the Argan oil for a week now and I am very impressed at how this oil makes my skin feel so soft. I have used it on my hands, my face after washing off my make-up for the day and on my hair. I will continue to use this wonderful oil for the foreseeable future. Thank you for a great product at a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Patriot127

customer_reviews.title: Good facial moisturizer
customer_reviews.text: I bought this oil to use as a facial moisturizer and my skin has improved since I started using it. I needed to simplify my skincare routine because I was using too many different things, which was causing oiliness and breakouts. So I got this and my skin is moisturized but not oily and it's clearing up.
customer_reviews.author: RED13

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: bad smell oil ever! Unfortunately that I opened and used it that make me can not return it.
customer_reviews.author: Tuan Dao

customer_reviews.title: I am so happy to have found this
customer_reviews.text: I am so happy to have found this! I’ve only seen it on Amazon. The only other brand I have tried is Josie Maran (because I thought it was the best out there). This works just as well if not BETTER because it’s organic. You can’t beat the value!
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa

customer_reviews.title: Gotta Love This
customer_reviews.text: Love this oil. Also purchased Eve Hansen rosehip oil to mix with it (50:50 and top with a few drops of my favourite essential oils). My skin appears a whole lot healthier, fuller, fresher, and more radiant. The texture is light and not sticky at all, and it doesn't smell. I am really happy with it and even happier to have more time left to do something else other than having to carefully apply layers and layers of skin care products when I'm actually dead tired or in a rush. It is basically everything I need.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Miracle Worker!
customer_reviews.text: This product worked wonders on my arms, legs and feet. My skin never felt softer. Rub a couple of drops or Argan Oil between your palms and massage your feet, Happy Feet! Smooth, rough skin is gone. I am using it under my eyes now and the fine lines seem a little less prominent. I am extremely happy with this product and will order again. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Cookies7007

customer_reviews.title: Phantom Dirty Diaper Smell
customer_reviews.text: I have no complaints about the texture and the oil absorbs into the skin which is great for dry skin. But I have a keen sense of smell so it's difficult for me to get past the diarrhea-ish scent that fills my nose each time I spread the oil on my face. That's said, my husband (whose sense of smell is average) says he doesn't really smell the bad odor that I do. Also, once the oil dries, I no longer smell the odor, so at least it's temporary..
customer_reviews.author: Nori

customer_reviews.title: I have to say I love this product
customer_reviews.text: I have to say I love this product. It seems that my sink is softer and smoother. Only a small amount is needed. I use this for all over body oil and also use a very small amount at the ends of my hair. Wonderful product and I will buy again and again and again. Thank you Eve Hansen!
customer_reviews.author: Denise

customer_reviews.title: I bought this in hope of treating keratosis pilaris on ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this in hope of treating keratosis pilaris on my legs and arms. This is high quality Argan oil for a reasonable price. It has improved the redness and bumps. I mix it with Aveeno moisturizer and apply it. I have to use it every day to see the difference, but I have definitely experienced improvement after just one bottle. I am ordering more and will update about continued results.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Smells weird.
customer_reviews.text: I tried this brand in an effort to save money. Upon using the oil, it smelled unpleasant. I didn't see the same smoothness after use. I still gave more than half a bottle. I have since gone back to Josie Maran. Sorry but its not as good as hers.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The only product I will use to heal my skin ...
customer_reviews.text: The only product I will use to heal my skin! It is silky, lasts forever, is a very fair price and ships very quickly and is well packaged. When you take a few drops and rub into any part of your body, you will immediately see the results. I have been using this product for over a year and I can tell you I wouldn't order anything else. Nothing else comes close!
customer_reviews.author: plgoldsmith

customer_reviews.title: a must have
customer_reviews.text: Another great experience with Even Hansen. This is my 5th or 6th purchase from this seller. I love the free and fast shipping. I have only contacted them with compliments and they returned my emails in a timely matter. I also highly recommend the rose water and Sweet Almond Oil; they leave my skin so silky smooth. I look forward to my order of their lemon oil which is on its way to me now.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie

customer_reviews.title: I use it in my hair and on my skin and it gives amazing results !
customer_reviews.text: This is truly the Best company to purchase oils! This oil is of the highest quality! I use it in my hair and on my skin and it gives amazing results of gorgeous, shiny, glossy hair and smooth, moisturized skin. I recommend this company to all my friends as it is the BEST! THANK YOU!
customer_reviews.author: Christine Faber

customer_reviews.title: Very nice light, clean oil
customer_reviews.text: Very nice light, clean oil. Absorbs quickly and not greasy. I am using it on my face at night but have only had it for 2 days so can't say about the long term benefits. Just a couple of drops leaves my skin very soft and feeling moisturized. I use an argan oil body lotion and shampoo which I really love so I'm thinking this will be a keeper.
customer_reviews.author: Countess Ferrari

customer_reviews.title: Love the results.
customer_reviews.text: The container can be messy. I keep the bottle in a baggie and am careful how I handle it. A little goes a long way. I noticed a difference the first morning after using it the evening before. I also put a few drops in my hair after shampooing. It left a very soft effect. Love this little bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Pat

customer_reviews.title: Great for sensitive and breakout prone skin!
customer_reviews.text: I love this Argan Oil. I've been using it for about a month now and have sensitive skin. I typically use all Kiehls products, but since finding out I was expecting, I wanted to switch to something more natural. It has not made me breakout at all - I thought since I was slathering oil on my face that this would be the case, but not so! Feels nice in the morning and evening. I wear under make-up and it's fine to use with any powder or foundation.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Vancheri

customer_reviews.title: Nice oil, works excellent in skin, not as nice aroma
customer_reviews.text: Actually I bought this oil because I has another argan oil that was great for hydrating my skin and actually getting rid of toenail fungus. I saw some other types of oils and this one had the best reviews. I like it, work find, not as good as the one I had before, but I think because this one is pure argan and the other one I had included more essences. The product at the end works, it doesn't have like a really nice scent, but fulfills its purpose of hydrating.
customer_reviews.author: Nydia S

customer_reviews.title: Works really great
customer_reviews.text: I've been using it on my hair and lashes and have noticed a difference. My lashes are getting noticeably longer and fuller. Several people are commenting on them, wondering what I'm doing to get them so long. My hair is softer, shinier, and more manageable. I haven't tried it on my skin, but only because I've been using it all on my hair. Definitely recommend and will repurchase.
customer_reviews.author: Airi

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this for several months and it helps with many things. My daughter had a scar from stitches so I used this; the scar is disappearing quite well. I also use this for my oily skin and it keeps the oil at bay very well. One 4 ounce bottle last me for about 2-3 months and I use it on almost everything I need. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: GG

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Smelled so foul I didn't even bother trying it out. Returned it immediately.
customer_reviews.author: Em

customer_reviews.title: Fine little wrinkles disappeared and my skin is silky smoothly
customer_reviews.text: After about a month of using this product i can say that my skin changes drastically. Fine little wrinkles disappeared and my skin is silky smoothly. I am very happy with the product. Use it every day morning and night.
customer_reviews.author: anita

customer_reviews.title: Argan oil
customer_reviews.text: Looks and feels correct. The tip of the dropper was chipped but that doesn't affect the oil's performance so I did not deduct a star, however, it is something to watch out for since it makes the dropper scratchy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this oil
customer_reviews.text: I'm loving this oil, have been using for about 2 wks. I add 3 or 4 drops to my morning & evening face moisturizer, I use a drop straight on my lips before lipstick, and add a few drops to my hair serum and use that on damp hair. It leaves my skin very soft, not greasy, and it's been very clear, no bumps or breakouts.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine

customer_reviews.title: This argan oil is generously portioned, and it seems ...
customer_reviews.text: This argan oil is generously portioned, and it seems to be high quality, but it makes my sensitive skin break out. I've only tried one other brand of argan oil and did not have any issues with breakouts. I tried this kind due to the lower price, but I will be switching back to the original brand.
customer_reviews.author: K. Marti

customer_reviews.title: This oil is great! I use it on my face at night ...
customer_reviews.text: This oil is great! I use it on my face at night as a moisturizer. It does not clog my pores and leaves my skin very soft. I am a 43 year old female, white with sensitive skin prone to rosacea.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Jones

customer_reviews.title: Ditch the Chemicals
customer_reviews.text: To eliminate the tons of chemicals in traditional moisturizers I tried this wonderful oil. No clogged pores, and dry spots are diminishing. Just a few drops warmed in your fingers will spread easily. I add a few drops of Vitamin E to eliminate pigment spots as well. Leftovers are added to the ends of my hair. I'm very happy with the results!
customer_reviews.author: Marjorie Wimmersberger

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality Product
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with this product - EXCELLENT price compared to another very popular argan oil on the market (on a shopping network) - I use two drops to moisturize my face before applying foundation and it works wonderfully - I let it penetrate for about 10 minutes before applying foundation - Will definitely order this product again - Thank You!!
customer_reviews.author: edmond

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful for your skin!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using Argon oil on my face and neck for a few years now. I purchased some when traveling in the south of Spain. I've been looking for a good quality oil ever since I ran out and I found it! This is the true oil! Also a bonus, Eve Hanson sent me a nice e-booklet which I printed, as it shows many other ways to use your argon oil. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Laura B.

customer_reviews.title: Works fast
customer_reviews.text: Started seeing results the first time I used this. It makes hair very soft for those who have dryer hair this works almost instantly. It mixes well for those who use pastes or pomades, and does not leave the skin outside of hairline greasy or oily. Highly recommend this to anyone dealing with dry hair issues I use this daily
customer_reviews.author: Jon

customer_reviews.title: Terrible Smell
customer_reviews.text: It has a terrible smell, unlike any Argan oil I have used before. I would return but I missed the timeframe to return. Maybe I just got a bad one but it smells so bad I can’t use it.
customer_reviews.author: Kati S.

customer_reviews.title: This is a light oil that absorbs quickly into the ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a light oil that absorbs quickly into the skin. It has no odor, or stickiness to it. I wait a minute or two and then apply make-up. I also use at bedtime😴
customer_reviews.author: Pamela P. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Amazing moisturizer!
customer_reviews.text: First time user. I use on my face after cleansing and actually love how the oil sinks in and moisturizes my skin. Have also paired a couple drops with body lotion to accentuate moisture. Also love the fact that it’s 100% pure Argan Oil and no preservatives or any other bogus ingredients. I use on my hair as well, and it gives great shine! However, if you have shorter hair, I would suggest 1 small drop.
customer_reviews.author: Stephy

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: I love this Argan oil. The price was decent for a 4oz bottle compared to what it costs in a store. My skin feels smooth and looks youthful; the oil is non-greasy. I apply it morning & night. I also have acne prone skin & this oil seems to work well with my skin so far.
customer_reviews.author: Shell

customer_reviews.title: Great Oil
customer_reviews.text: I have been using Argan oil for about a year. I started using the oil daily as a way to rehydrate the skin on my face. The oil is organic, has a nice smell, is not greasy and a little dap of oil goes a long way. My skin no longer has that "leathery" feel and look. When I purchased this oil it was on sale for a great price. I would highly recommend this oil. Also
customer_reviews.author: Jane Wilson

customer_reviews.title: I would recommend this to my friends as well
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this product for about a month now. I noticed right away my face was smoother and my pores were visibly smaller. I use it under my daily moisturizer as well as after I take my make up off before bed. I will be buying more of this Argan oil... I would recommend this to my friends as well!
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Raines

customer_reviews.title: You need this!
customer_reviews.text: Changed my skincare routine. I love it on my hair, nails, face, everything! I recommend it to all my friends, seriously a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Mariah

customer_reviews.title: It's great!
customer_reviews.text: Oh man, do I love this oil. I have extremely dry skin and I use this all over to help treat my dry, itchy skin from this winter weather. I like that it doesn't really have a smell. It goes on very oily but is quickly absorbed into the skin. I wear it under my daily moisturizer and I believe it has helped improve my skin texture. I put a few drops into my hands and run it through my wet hair after a shower and it helps with static and flyaways.
customer_reviews.author: Katie C.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Aegean oil
customer_reviews.text: This Arian oil rocks! I use this as a moisturizer morning & night. I also put some in my oil mixture to cleanse my face. This is a great value. You get a lot of product for a great price! Some people say that Arian oil has a funny smell. Not to me. It may be that people are used to using synthetic products or products with chemicals. This is a must buy!
customer_reviews.author: Raw foodie

customer_reviews.title: How good your skin feels and looks when using this.
customer_reviews.text: I love everything about this product. Are use it every day and put it on throughout the day. It takes away all the dryness and keeps my skin soft and supple. I couldn’t go a day without this. I switch on and off with a different one. But this is all I use on my face.
customer_reviews.author: Ellen W.

customer_reviews.title: Good so far
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Using on my girls coarse curly hair after the bath. Leaves it smooth and soft. The dropper doesn't keep all the oil in so it can be messy
customer_reviews.author: nancy

customer_reviews.title: I am so happy with this Argan Oil
customer_reviews.text: I am so happy with this Argan Oil. My face is smoother than it has been in a while, and a very light touch is all that is needed. I also use this on my scalp to relieve dryness and itching, but it is very important to use only a small amount at a time. I have tried it on my cuticles and so far have not noticed any difference, but I will continue to try it for this application, as well.
customer_reviews.author: JeanneLai

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I use it on my dry skin, my hair, and my face when I ran out moisturizer. I don't buy moisturizer anymore by the way not since I've started using the argon oil and only two drops does the trick! A really good buy!
customer_reviews.author: RedSparrow

customer_reviews.title: smells bad, but maybe that's the smell of Argan oil?
customer_reviews.text: I didn't know Argan oil smelled so bad :( I had the shampoo and Marakkesh oil which both smelled great. I guess they had something mixed in it? I returned this, but giving 3 stars as the seller promptly refunded my return.
customer_reviews.author: MM

customer_reviews.title: And I've smelled real argan/Moroccan oil and this smells nothing like it.
customer_reviews.text: Seems a bit sticky. And I've smelled real argan/Moroccan oil and this smells nothing like it... Update: works fine, seems like a decent moisturizer but the smell is still awful... hard to get past it...
customer_reviews.author: P

customer_reviews.title: Love it soon as i get low ill be buying more
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff I mix it w teatree oil and use it on my face nightly I've seen big improvements in my skin it's almost flawless & I used to have oily skin that was broken out, not anymore definitely a go to in my beauty regimen
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Lynn

customer_reviews.title: great natural moisturizing
customer_reviews.text: I used it for about 4 days, I am satisfied with it's moisturizing power, but should wait to see other results. After 2 months I will be back and add new comment.
customer_reviews.author: Nastaran

customer_reviews.title: Solid product
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised how this does help recent scars. I had surgery and just tried it because it was mentioned in the description. Works surprisingly well. Older scars it has not improved as of yet ( 3weeks use). I use it as a post shave and it works very well for that also.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Dry skin and hair - to the rescue
customer_reviews.text: Am using this amazing product to soften cuticles, as a nighttime moisturizer, on hair and around eyes in the morning (especially useful these days where there is no humidity in the air). I have tried other similar products - this is really good quality at such a great price! - Coming back for more.
customer_reviews.author: Lhansen

product_meta.title: Eve Hansen USDA Certified Organic Argan Oil (4oz) | Pure Moroccan Argan Oil for Hair, Skin and Nails | Carrier Oil, Face Moisturizer, Body Oil, Dry Scalp Treatment and Hair Oil for Dry Hair and Damage
feature_bullets: PURE ARGAN OIL: Our Moroccan Argan Oil is unfiltered and cold pressed for the highest quality.
DEEP HYDRATOR: Rich in vitamin e and fatty acids, aragon oil moisturizes dry hair, skin and nails.
RELIEVE APPEARANCE OF SCARS, burns, stretch marks, fine lines and wrinkles, revealing vibrant skin with argan oil of morocco.
NATURAL BODY FRESHNESS: Mix just a few drops to make argan oil shampoo, conditioner or cream.
SENSITIVE SKIN MOISTURIZER: argen oil gives deep conditioning to all skin. No Sulfates. No Parabens. No Phthalates.
